query: UPDATE product SET name = COALESCE(?1, name), image = COALESCE(?2, image), category_id = COALESCE(?3, category_id), sort_order = COALESCE(?4, sort_order), tax_rate = COALESCE(?5, tax_rate), receipt_name = COALESCE(?6, receipt_name), kitchen_print_name = COALESCE(?7, kitchen_print_name), is_kitchen_print_enabled = COALESCE(?8, is_kitchen_print_enabled), is_label_print_enabled = COALESCE(?9, is_label_print_enabled), is_active = COALESCE(?10, is_active), external_id = COALESCE(?11, external_id) WHERE id = ?12
